data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Geometry clearly is a math's thing - since this module only handles
    2D operations, I figured that Math::Geometry_2D is propably the best
    name for it. IF somebody ever feels the need to supply a similar set
    of functions for 3D, he/she might consider using Mat::Geometry_3D as
    a meaningful name.
